com.facebook.config.dynamic

Interface Option<V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OptionImpl, OptionTranslator

    public interface Option<V>

    • Method Summary

      void addWatcher(OptionWatcher<V> watcher)
      Registers a new watcher for this property.

    • Method Detail

      • getValue

        V getValue()

      • setValue

        void setValue(V value)

      • addWatcher

        void addWatcher(OptionWatcher<V> watcher)
        Registers a new watcher for this property. If the watcher is already watching this property, this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        watcher - a property watcher

      • removeWatcher

        void removeWatcher(OptionWatcher<V> watcher)
        Unregisters a watcher. If the watcher is not already watching this property, this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        watcher - a property watcher
